hypothesis_content.title: MicroStrategy (MSTR) Premium/Discount to NAV Mean Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When the premium of MSTR stock price to its Bitcoin NAV per share exceeds 25% or falls to a discount greater than 10%, the premium/discount will revert by at least 50% toward its 20-day average within 10 trading days, provided the broader crypto market (BTC) is not in a STRESS regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: MSTR acts as a leveraged Bitcoin proxy. Extreme premiums attract arbitrage (e.g., buying BTC/shorting MSTR) or equity issuance. Extreme discounts attract activist investors or buybacks. The reversion is a function of corporate action and arbitrage mechanics, but is suspended during market-wide stress when correlations break.
entry_conditions: MSTR Premium to BTC NAV > 25% OR < -10%
MSTR 20-day average daily trading volume > $500M (liquidity filter)
Enter at market on daily close confirming condition

exit_conditions.take_profit: Premium/Discount has moved 50% of the distance from the entry level back toward its 20-day average
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Premium extends to > 35% or discount extends to < -15%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The 50% reversion target is not achieved before the time exit in more than 40% of signals, indicating the premium/discount can become a new persistent state.
